message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $110. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking $105 would be a more reasonable price for me. Would you be willing to accept this price?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as high as $105. I'm willing to give you a slight concession and offer the product to you for $108. What do you think?
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $108. Would you be willing to meet me at $102?
I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as high as $102. I'm willing to give you another concession and offer the product to you for $106. What do you think?
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still trying to get the best deal. Would you be willing to meet me at $100?

Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go back to $100. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $104. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still trying to get the best deal. Would you be willing to meet me at $102?
